BBEX3.A.KZT.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Kazakhstan / EUR 1 = KZT ... (middle)
Source: National Bank of Kazakhstan, Almaty.
Methodology: Until 2000, calculated on the basis of month-end rates, and from 2001 on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.

Comment on 2009: On 5 February 2009, the tenge was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates.  4 February 2009: EUR 1 = KZT 157,07  5 February 2009: EUR 1 = KZT 186,55.  Calculated devaluation: 15.8%.
